title: [python撚] 呢個 app 要點裝？

replies.msg:
https://www.postgresql.org/ftp/pgadmin3/pgadmin4/v1.1/pip/

download 左佢個 .whl
run 左 pip install pgadmin4-1.1-py3-none-any.whl
但 run pgadmin4 -> command not found

help
可能唔係裝係Shell搜索command嘅path，再裝一次用 pip install whatever_program --log logout.txt ，睇吓裝咗去邊裝咗乜嘢
會唔會你有python 2 同3同時run緊? 係就可能要pip3 install, 唔係pip install喇, 好似係!

綜合兩位巴打建議：
[code]
$ sudo pip3 install pgadmin4-1.1-py3-none-any.whl --log log.txt

$ cat log.txt
Processing ./pgadmin4-1.1-py3-none-any.whl
Requirement already satisfied: psycopg2==2.6.2 in /usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from pgadmin4==1.1)
....
Requirement already satisfied: argparse in /usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages (from django-htmlmin==0.8.0->pgadmin4==1.1)
Installing collected packages: pgadmin4

Successfully installed pgadmin4-1.1
Cleaning up...

$ which pgadmin4
which: no pgadmin4 in (/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/bin:/opt/android-sdk/platform-tools:/opt/cuda/bin:/usr/lib/jvm/default/bin:/usr/bin/site_perl:/usr/bin/vendor_perl:/usr/bin/core_perl)
[/code]

屌，原來係web app 黎

[code]

$ cd ../web/
$ virtualenv venv
Using base prefix '/usr'
New python executable in /home/abcd/Downloads/pgadmin/pgadmin4-1.1/web/venv/bin/python
Installing setuptools, pip, wheel...done.
$ python pgAdmin4.
python: can't open file 'pgAdmin4.': [Errno 2] No such file or directory
$ python pgAdmin4.py
pgAdmin 4 - Application Initialisation
======================================


The configuration database - '/home/admin0/.pgadmin/pgadmin4.db' does not exist.
Entering initial setup mode...
NOTE: Configuring authentication for SERVER mode.


Enter the email address and password to use for the initial pgAdmin user account:

Email address:
Password:
Retype password:

The configuration database has been created at /home/abcd/efg/pgadmin4.db
Starting pgAdmin 4. Please navigate to http://localhost:5050 in your browser.

[/code]
sudo find / -name whatever_program -print ，嗱，硬碟會係咁轉，唔使經，耐心啲等等
sudo find / -name whatever_program -print ，嗱，硬碟會係咁轉，唔使驚，耐心啲等等

sudo find / -name whatever_program -print ，嗱，硬碟會係咁轉，唔使驚，耐心啲等等

唔用pip 喇
用佢個 tar ball 裝左，搞掂

anyway thanks bro
pip應該只係用嚟裝modules, 要係python REPL or source打from xyz import abc 咁用, 唔係直接係command line打個module名就用得架喎!

pip應該只係用嚟裝modules, 要係python REPL or source打from xyz import abc 咁用, 唔係直接係command line打個module名就用得架喎!


pip install shadowsocks ，command line直接可用sslocal客戶端，ssserver直接用server

pip應該只係用嚟裝modules, 要係python REPL or source打from xyz import abc 咁用, 唔係直接係command line打個module名就用得架喎!


pip install shadowsocks ，command line直接可用sslocal客戶端，ssserver直接用server


原來可以用嚟裝executable, 不過呢類情況應該比較罕有!
